name: Geoffrey G. Xie
content: Geoffrey Xie's home page Geoffrey Xie Professor,  Computer Science Areas of expertise: Computer Networks Network management Network security analysis Enterprise network design Underwater acoustic networks Mobile cloud computing Military radio and satellite networks Network quality of services Office: Room 125, Glasgow Hall East  (GE-125) Snail Mail Address: Code CS/Xg Naval Postgraduate School 1411 Cunningham Rd, Glasgow Hall East Wing Monterey, CA 93943-5201 Office Phone:    (831) 656-2693 alternative Voice:     (831) 656-7961 Email:    xie at nps dot edu •    Publications •    Curriculum vitae (pdf file) • Selected Student Theses •    Regular schedule for the current quarter •    Travel / Leave dates •    Network and Mobility Track (PDF version of slides) We're looking for a few motivated students!
